channel.title: Make myself Admin
channel.description: Hey,How do i make myself admin i just made my 1st server today rofl. So can you tell me how to make myself admin and u get mod :P

item.title: Make myself Admin
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

4 is hidden owner, not admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Make myself Admin
item.dc:creator: @Syfal Syfal
item.description:
@Syfal wrote:

Change the character rights text from “0” to “1” (for mod), “2” (for admin), “3” (for owner), or “4” (for hidden admin).

Note: Do not include the quotation marks.

Hidden admins are basically admins without the crown, they are good to have some around as a kind of secret agent to report what people and staff are doing.

This works because people react differently to staff members than they do to non staff members.

Read full topic

item.title: Make myself Admin
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

character-rights = 0
thats what new characters will say.

character-rights = 1
thats mod

character-rights = 2
Admin

character-rights = 3
Owner

character-rights = 4
Hidden.

At least these should be the default.

Change your characters to what you want

Hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: Make myself Admin
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Change the character-rights variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Make myself Admin
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

Go into the character files, go to your account and you should see

Rights = 0

Change that to

1 - Mod
2 - Admin
3 - Owner
4 - Hidden Owner
20 - Root admin

Make sure you are logged out or it will not work.

Read full topic
